DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the effectiveness of a resistance training program on reducing systemic inflammation and improving chemotherapy completion in lung cancer patients being treated with curative intent chemotherapy.
DOC.brief_title: Resistance Training in Lung Cancer Patients on Chemotherapy
DOC.criteria: Histologically diagnosed with lung cancer Stage I, II, or III Eligible for chemotherapy with curative intent 21 years of age or older Approval to participate in study by treating oncologist or family physician Unstable cardiac disease Untreated bone or brain metastases
